TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit DataBoundControl extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl
Public MustInherit Class DataBoundControl Inherits BaseDataBoundControl

summary.span: 用作所有以列表或表格形式显示数据的 ASP.NET 2.0 版数据绑定控件的基类。

span.span: Serves as the base class for all ASP.NET version 2.0 data-bound controls that display their data in list or tabular form.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类是用于检索表格的 ASP.NET 控件的基类或从 ASP.NET 数据的列表样式数据源控件，并将控件的用户界面 (UI) 元素绑定到该数据以供显示。The class is the base class used for ASP.NET controls that retrieve tabular or list-style data from an ASP.NET data source control and bind user-interface (UI) elements of the control to that data for display. 复合数据绑定控件，如， ，和; 列表样式数据绑定控件，如和; 和类似于其他控件派生自。Composite data-bound controls such as , , and ; list-style data-bound controls such as and ; and other controls such as derive from . 不使用网页开发人员类直接; 相反，它们使用从此类派生的控件。Page developers do not use the class directly; instead, they use controls that derive from this class. 控件开发人员扩展此类，以创建可与实现的类的数据绑定控件接口和类派生自和类。Control developers extend this class to create data-bound controls that work with classes that implement the interface and classes that derive from the and classes. 派生类时类，请替代方法来检索到的数据绑定控件的 UI 元素方法。When deriving a class from the class, override the method to bind the UI elements of your control to data retrieved by the method. 在大多数情况下，方法是在派生类中的设置将替代的唯一方法。In most cases, the method is the only method you will override in your derived class. 对于 ASP.NET 2.0 数据绑定控件，方法相当于`DataBind`方法，并被调用来将数据绑定在运行时。For ASP.NET 2.0 data-bound controls, the method is the equivalent of the `DataBind` method, and is called to bind data at run time. 方法调用和方法。The method calls the and methods. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何从派生类类创建自定义的数据绑定控件。The following code example demonstrates how to derive a class from the class to create a custom data-bound control. `TextBoxSet`控件创建控制每个数据项检索通过其关联的数据源控件，并在运行时将绑定到数据项的值。The `TextBoxSet` control creates a control for each data item retrieved from its associated data source control, and binds to the value of the data item at run time. 当前实现`Render`方法呈现控件作为未经排序的列表。The current implementation of the `Render` method renders the controls as an unordered list. [!code-csharp[Samples.AspNet.TextBoxSet#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.TextBoxSet/CS/textboxset.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Samples.AspNet.TextBoxSet#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.TextBoxSet/VB/textboxset.vb#2)] 下面的代码示例演示如何使用`TextBoxSet`控件，在前面的示例中定义并将其绑定到控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the `TextBoxSet` control, defined in the previous example, and bind it to an control. [!code-aspx-csharp[Samples.AspNet.TextBoxSet#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.TextBoxSet/CS/textboxsetcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Samples.AspNet.TextBoxSet#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.TextBoxSet/VB/textboxsetvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 在数据方法正被调用时发生。

span.span: Occurs when data methods are being called.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件的用途是为你提供机会指定数据方法要被调用位于不同的对象比对象。The purpose of this event is to give you an opportunity to specify that the data methods to be called are on a different object than the object. 在 Web 窗体中使用模型绑定教程系列，请参阅[模型绑定和 Web 窗体](/aspnet/web-forms/overview/presenting-and-managing-data/model-binding/retrieving-data)。For a tutorial series on using model binding with Web Forms, see [Model Binding and Web Forms](/aspnet/web-forms/overview/presenting-and-managing-data/model-binding/retrieving-data).

span.span: The name of the specific list of data that the data-bound control binds to, if more than one list is supplied by a data source control.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值属性存储视图状态中。The value of the property is stored in view state. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅和[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法检索对象关联的数据源控件，通过调用从方法。The method retrieves a object from the associated data source control by calling the method. 如果属性用于标识数据源，默认创建对象。If the property is used to identify a data source, a default object is created. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何调用方法来检索从关联的数据源控件的对象和调用方法来检索数据。The following code example demonstrates how the method is called to retrieve the object from the associated data source control and the method is called to retrieve the data. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置此属性使`Item`和`BindItem`数据绑定表达式。Setting this property enables the `Item` and `BindItem` data-binding expressions. 自动设置此方法可启用动态数据功能。Setting this method automatically enables Dynamic Data functionality. 在 Web 窗体中使用模型绑定教程系列，请参阅[模型绑定和 Web 窗体](/aspnet/web-forms/overview/presenting-and-managing-data/model-binding/retrieving-data)。For a tutorial series on using model binding with Web Forms, see [Model Binding and Web Forms](/aspnet/web-forms/overview/presenting-and-managing-data/model-binding/retrieving-data).

summary.span: 将视图状态中的控件状态设置为成功绑定到数据。

span.span: Sets the state of the control in view state as successfully bound to data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 数据绑定控件保持视图状态，该值指示是否当前绑定到数据中的值。The data-bound control maintains a value in view state that indicates whether it is currently bound to data. 方法将值设置为`true`。The method sets the value to `true`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何方法由派生的数据绑定控件类。The following code example demonstrates how the method is used by a derived data-bound control class. 通过检索数据后方法，并绑定到控件方法，属性设置为`false`和方法是调用以指示在控件完成绑定并且不再在当前页面的生命周期过程中需要它。After data is retrieved by the method and bound to the control with the method, the property is set to `false` and the method is called to signal that the control has completed binding and no longer requires it during the current page's life cycle. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[Samples.AspNet.TextBoxSet#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.TextBoxSet/CS/textboxset.cs#3)] [!code-vb[Samples.AspNet.TextBoxSet#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.TextBoxSet/VB/textboxset.vb#3)]

span.span: Rebinds the data-bound control to its data after one of the base data source identification properties changes.

span.span: The source of the event, the .
An that contains event data.

summary.span: 引发 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法通知的数据绑定控件基础数据源已更改，并且该控件应重新绑定应执行任何必要的工作。The method notifies a data-bound control that the underlying data source has changed and that the control should rebind and any necessary work should be performed. 通常情况下，数据源视图的属性已更改时调用方法。Typically, the method is called when a property of the data source view has changed. 类集属性`true`时，它会发出事件。The class sets the property to `true` when it raises the event. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

span.para: 在重写在派生类中，一定要调用基类的方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。
When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类调用方法以设置的数据绑定控件和集的初始化的状态属性`true`如果 HTTP 请求不是回发。The class calls the method to set the initialized state of the data-bound control and sets the property to `true` if the HTTP request is not a postback.

summary.span: 在加载数据绑定控件之前设置该控件的初始化状态。

span.span: Sets the initialized state of the data-bound control before the control is loaded.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法被重写通过类来设置属性`true`情况下，HTTP 请求是回发和启用视图状态，但尚未绑定数据绑定控件中。The method is overridden by the class to set the property to `true` in cases where the HTTP request is a postback and view state is enabled but the data-bound control has not yet been bound. 这种情况下是常见的控件，如和、 在运行时更改控件的可见性的位置。This scenario is common with controls such as and , where the visibility of the control is changed at run time.

param.name: data
param.span: 从 方法调用返回的数据的 列表。

span.span: The list of data returned from a method call.

summary.span: 在派生类中重写时，将数据源中的数据绑定到控件。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, binds data from the data source to the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实现此方法，而不是方法派生中的数据绑定控件时类。Implement this method instead of the method when you derive a data-bound control from the class. 放置控件的数据绑定中的逻辑使你可以避免和以错误的顺序引发的事件。Placing your control's data-binding logic in enables you to avoid the and events being raised in the wrong order. 虽然基类提供了此方法中，没有特定实现方法由调用方法以将任何用户界面 (UI) 的值绑定控件添加到将检索的数据方法。While the base class provides no specific implementation for this method, the method is called by the method to bind the values of any user interface (UI) controls to the data that is retrieved by the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何实现从派生类中的方法。The following code example demonstrates how to implement the method in a class derived from . `TextBoxSet`控件创建绑定到每个数据项的控件。The `TextBoxSet` control creates a control for each data item it is bound to. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[Samples.AspNet.TextBoxSet#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.TextBoxSet/CS/textboxset.cs#5)] [!code-vb[Samples.AspNet.TextBoxSet#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.TextBoxSet/VB/textboxset.vb#5)]

MemberSignature.Value: protected override void PerformSelect ();
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance void PerformSelect() cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub PerformSelect ()
protected: override void PerformSelect();

summary.span: 从关联的数据源中检索数据。

span.span: Retrieves data from the associated data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 后检索数据以将数据绑定到数据绑定控件的元素调用方法。The method is called after data is retrieved to bind data to elements of the data-bound control. 派生的类型重写此方法来检索数据，仅当默认实现是不够的。Derived types override this method to retrieve data only if the default implementation is not adequate. 通常情况下，只需提供委托执行任何自定义数据的工作，而不是实现方法。Typically, it is sufficient to provide a delegate that performs any custom data work, rather than implementing the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写方法来检索数据，从关联的数据源使用方法并将其绑定到控件的元素。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method to retrieve data from an associated data source using the method and bind it to the elements of the control. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[Samples.AspNet.TextBoxSet#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.TextBoxSet/CS/textboxset.cs#3)] [!code-vb[Samples.AspNet.TextBoxSet#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.TextBoxSet/VB/textboxset.vb#3)]

.property instance class System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments SelectArguments
Protected ReadOnly Property SelectArguments As DataSourceSelectArguments
protected: property System::Web::UI::DataSourceSelectArguments ^ SelectArguments { System::Web::UI::DataSourceSelectArguments ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取数据绑定控件从数据源控件检索数据时使用的 对象。

span.span: Gets a object that the data-bound control uses when retrieving data from a data source control.

value.span: 数据绑定控件用于检索数据的 值。

span.span: A value used by the data-bound control to retrieve data.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性调用方法来创建默认对象。The property calls the method to create a default object.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual string SelectMethod { get; set; }
.property instance string SelectMethod
Public Overridable Property SelectMethod As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ SelectMethod { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 为了读取数据要调用的方法的名称。

span.span: The name of the method to call in order to read data.
The name of the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置此属性会导致模型绑定要用作数据绑定方法。Setting this property causes model binding to be used as the data-binding method. 在 Web 窗体中使用模型绑定教程系列，请参阅[模型绑定和 Web 窗体](/aspnet/web-forms/overview/presenting-and-managing-data/model-binding/retrieving-data)。For a tutorial series on using model binding with Web Forms, see [Model Binding and Web Forms](/aspnet/web-forms/overview/presenting-and-managing-data/model-binding/retrieving-data).

MemberSignature.Value: protected override void TrackViewState ();
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance void TrackViewState() cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub TrackViewState ()
protected: override void TrackViewState();

summary.span: 导致要跟踪的控件的视图状态的更改，以便这些更改可以存储到控件的 对象中。

span.span: Causes view-state changes to the control to be tracked so they can be stored in the control's object.

param.span: 设置为 属性的对象。

span.span: An object set to the property.

summary.span: 验证数据绑定控件绑定到的对象是否可以和该控件一同使用。

span.span: Verifies that the object a data-bound control binds to is one it can work with.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅调用方法类的赋值函数 (`set`访问器) 为属性。The method is only called in the class's mutator (`set` accessor) for the property. 类将检查为设置对象的类型属性以确保它是实例， ，或接口。The class checks the type of the object that is set for the property to ensure that it is an instance of the , , or interface.

exception.span: 参数传递的对象不为 ，也不是可以识别的类型。

span.span: The object passed by the parameter is not or a recognized type.
